Some Lesser Known Facts About Surbhi Jyoti

Does Surbhi Jyoti smoke?: No

Does Surbhi Jyoti drink alcohol?: No

Surbhi started her career as a theatre artist, RJ and debater, and even won the National Debate Championship thrice.

Before joining TV industry in Mumbai, she also worked in few Punjabi films, music videos and serials.

She played 5 different roles in her popular TV series, Qubool Hai.

She is a close friend of TV actress Asha Negi, Riddhi Dogra and Shalini Kapoor.

If not an actress, then she would have been a teacher.

She has a habit of forgetting dates, such as birthday or wedding anniversary.

She has hydrophobia i.e. extreme or irrational fear of water.

Her Ex-boyfriend, Zorawar Singh was the brother of Punjabi actress Madhurjeet Sarghi.

She loves collecting shoes.
